Core Functionality

Core consists of two simple functions. More...

Functions

void init_conflate (conflate_config_t *conf)

bool start_conflate (conflate_config_t conf)
 The main entry point for starting a conflate agent.

Detailed Description

Core consists of two simple functions.

init_conflate is used to provide default values to a configuration and start_conflate launches the communication loop.

Function Documentation

void init_conflate ( conflate_config_t *  conf  ) 

Initialize the given configuration to defaults.

This should be called *before* you fill in your config.

Parameters:
conf configuration to be initialized
Examples:
examples/bot.c.
